title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
2. Fry bacon until crispy.
3. In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan cheese.
4. Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg-cheese mixture.
5. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a buttery, creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
2. Grill or pan-fry chicken until lightly charred.
3. Cook onions and tomatoes until soft, then blend into a smooth gravy.
4. Add cream and butter, then mix in chicken pieces.
5. Simmer for 10 minutes and serve hot with rice or naan.
